product_name: Outside Inside Sit On Top Kayak Ornament - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Pay homage to your outdoor adventures and add a dose of charm to your holiday decorations with this whimsical Sit On Top Kayak ornament from Outside Inside. Intricate details give this outdoor-themed ornament a realistic appearance that will look great on the tree. Made of resin with a braided cord to hang from the tree. Closeout.
short_description: Pay homage to your outdoor adventures and add a dose of charm to your holiday decorations with this whimsical Sit On Top Kayak ornament from Outside Inside.
